mapper.sql: a.id, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.sys_org_code, a.apply_no, a.apply_by, a.apply_date, a.depart_id, a.arrival_count, a.audit_status, a.audit_by, a.audit_date, a.refuse_reason, a.is_in_refund, a.is_end, a.total_num, a.submit_status, a.out_depart_id, a.remarks, a.del_flag
LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.id = a.apply_by
LEFT JOIN sys_depart f ON a.depart_id = f.id
mapper.select: select IFNULL(d.name,'其他') as x, sum(a.arrival_count) as y , sum(c.selling_price * a.arrival_count) as 'z' from pd_apply_order a left join pd_apply_detail b on a.apply_no=b.apply_no left join pd_product c on b.product_id=c.id left join pd_category d on d.id=c.category_two where a.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(a.apply_date) and date(a.apply_date) <=CURDATE() group by x order by y desc
